title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: ADA Drops 3.2%, Leading Index Lower From Monday
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Hedera (HBAR) joined Cardano (ADA) as an underperformer, declining 2.4%.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3890.01, down 0.4% (-15.92) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

Ten of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: DOT (+1.9%) and POL (+1.5%).

Laggards: ADA (-3.2%) and HBAR (-2.4%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 index declined 0.4% with more assets trading lower than higher, led by significant drops in ADA (-3.2%) and HBAR (-2.4%).
